message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, a fair and simple beginning!
You started high, I'll try to negotiate from here!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away too much. You can try to negotiate further if you want!
You're not giving me enough, I'm willing to meet you in the middle!
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm still trying to get a better deal. You can try to counteroffer if you want!
I think we're getting close, let's see if we can finalize the deal!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the farm. You can try to negotiate further if you want!
It's time to be fair, let's split it down the middle!
